text: They are called Tags and here is the link <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags>
There’s documentation on that page for the `linked_image` tag which is the same thing as that default module

Is it possible to format personalization tokens? I’m trying to add them as a query string to a url that the user is redirected to after submitting a form. `<http://redirect-url.com/?industry={{contact.industry%7Creplace(|redirect-url.com/?industry={{contact.industry|replace(>' ', '+')}}` doesn’t seem to be working

I’m using the blog system to host an Events page.

We’d like to be able to sort the events chronologically using our custom event date field value.

The sort filter seems to only support default HubSpot attributes.

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#sort>

Is there a creative way to sort blog posts by custom field values?
Can you use HubDB for this instead? <https://www.smartbugmedia.com/blog/creating-event-listing-using-hubdb>
